page.title: 16TRANSPORT 2
page.content: Whitchurch is served by a number of {bus operators}running services to most of North Shropshire and the surrounding towns and villages in Clwyd and Cheshire.Daily services run to Wem,Shrewsbury,Market Drayton, Chester,Newcastle-under-Lyme,Ellesmere and Oswestry.Several school services are also operated.Shearing's Salopia is the most important bus company.In addition to local services they run coach holidays and day excursions,28 of the latter being operated in June 1985.Whitchurch is on the {Crewe- {Shrewsbury railway line}with 9 services to both destinations on weekdays and 2 services in each direction on sundays.Most of these trains serve local stations such as Nantwich,Prees and Wem.Good links with Inter-City services are available at Crewe and Shrewsbury.
